action.label: Set as Pydev Project
action.tooltip: Set project as a Pydev project

command.description: Goes to the first non space char or first char of the line depending on the cursor position.
command.name: First char
Next Method or Class
command.description: Navigates to the next method or class definition

command.name: Previous Method or Class
command.description: Navigates to the previous method or class definition

command.name: Convert space-tabs to tabs
command.description: Converts tab-width space groups to tabs from selected region or whole document if nothing selected

command.name: Convert tabs to space-tabs
command.description: Converts tabs to tab-width space groups from selected region or whole document if nothing selected

command.name: Remove Comment Block
command.description: Removes a python comment block

command.name: Add Comment Block
command.description: Creates a python comment block

command.name: Add Single Comment Block
command.description: Creates a comment block from a single line

command.name: Python Uncomment
command.description: Uncomments a python line (Removes # from the beggining of the line)

command.name: Python Comment
command.description: Comments a python line (Adds # to beggining of the line)

command.name: Python Toggle Comment
command.description: Toggles comments of python line/s (Adds/Removes # at beggining of the line)

command.name: Python Go To Definition
command.description: Goes to the definition of a python element

command.name: Python Collapse
command.description: Collapse block of code

command.name: Python Un Collapse
command.description: Un Collapse block of code

command.name: Python Collapse All
command.description: Collapse all blocks of code

command.name: Python Un Collapse All
command.description: Un Collapse all blocks of code

command.name: Python Show Outline
command.description: Show Outline

command.name: Python Show Class Browser
command.description: Show Class Browser

command.name: Python Organize Imports
command.description: Organize Imports

command.name: Python Format Code
command.description: Format Code

command.name: Select Word
command.description: Select the whole word

command.name: Offline Action for scripting
command.description: Offline Action for scripting
